snippet: The inquiry by the agency's enforcement unit adds to the scrutiny of Herbalife, the nutritional supplements company that has been a favorite target of prominent hedge fund short-sellers.
abstract: The inquiry by the agency's enforcement unit adds to the scrutiny of Herbalife, the nutritional supplements company that has been a favorite target of prominent hedge fund short-sellers.

byline.original: By BEN PROTESS and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED
